title: Set alias for columns in dataset, but in expression builder, the old column names are still shown when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder and double-clicking on the first column name
EB: According to SCR 78193 in tracker, the first column in the expression builder should display the alias name instead of the original name
SR:
1. Open the expression builder
2. Select the dataset
3. Double-click on the first column name and observe the result
